proof_script:
lemma halt_lemma2''': "\<lbrakk>\<forall>n. \<not> P (f n) \<and> Q (f n) \<longrightarrow> Q (f (Suc n)) \<and> (f (Suc n), f n) \<in> LE; Q (f 0); \<forall>i<na. \<not> P (f i)\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> Q (f na)"
(*<*)
by (induct na) auto

(*<*)
by (induct na) auto
